QuestData.Title: From Bad to Worse
QuestData.Description: After their ship crashed, evil creatures swept up from the sea to pick through the wreckage. Our aid may seem but a drop in the pond at the thought of the misfortune they've faced today.$B$BDefeat their tormentors. These people desperately need our help.
QuestData.RewardText: You are a fear to behold upon the battlefield.
